long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabber: Your Personal Tab Manager and Privacy Protector!

Tired of losing track of all those open tabs? With Tabber, you can now effortlessly save and organize your open tabs for later, ensuring you never miss a beat. Our app empowers you to curate your online journey, allowing you to pick up where you left off, whenever you're ready.

But that's not all â€“ your privacy is our priority. Tabber lets you secure your tab collection with a robust password, giving you the peace of mind that your browsing sessions remain exclusively yours. Whether you're researching, shopping, or simply exploring, your tabs are protected against prying eyes.
